title: Glowing Disc for Watchmaker
summary: Tron inspired watchface. Now with laser removal and 12 different colors.
description: In order to use this watchface you need to download the WatchMaker app http://goo.gl/FMxUfY .This watchface was inspired by Tron.. I don't want to get a certain mouse mad at me with an infringement, because my daughter loves him, so I left it out of the title.Features:-Click the weather icon to change colors of the Tron Glowing Disc-Click the footprint with the step counter to access Google Fit.-Click the temperature to refresh the current conditions.-more to follow......Compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches..Tron is owned by Disney.This watchface is a tribute to the Identity Discs of Tron, it is of my own design.LONG LIVE TRON !
descriptionHTML:
In order to use this watchface you need to download the WatchMaker app http://goo.gl/FMxUfY .


This watchface was inspired by Tron.. I don't want to get a certain mouse mad at me with an infringement, because my daughter loves him, so I left it out of the title.

Features:
-Click the weather icon to change colors of the Tron Glowing Disc
-Click the footprint with the step counter to access Google Fit.
-Click the temperature to refresh the current conditions.
-more to follow......

Compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches..

Tron is owned by Disney.

This watchface is a tribute to the Identity Discs of Tron, it is of my own design.

LONG LIVE TRON !
comments: Way cool. I don't get the Tron comparison, to be honest. This is something unique, easy to read, informative, and eye catching.
recentChanges: ⌚ The numbers are lasered off when time changes.
⌚ Added New animation to color change
